# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-105">合规性中心 (DLP) 中的数据丢失防护包括许多可供您用于 DLP 策略的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-106">本主题列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并显示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-108">此外，关键字和校验和等确凿的证据可用于识别敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-110">敏感信息类型需要以下订阅之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-113">ABA 路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-114">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-115">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-116">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-117">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-118">四个数字，以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-119">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-120">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-121">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-122">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-123">无格式：九个以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头的连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-124">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-125">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-126">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-127">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-128">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-129">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-130">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-130">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-131">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-131">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-149">阿根廷国家/ (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-151">带或不带句号的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-151">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-153">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-154">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-155">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-155">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-156">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-157">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-157">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-158">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-159">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-160">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-161">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-162">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-163">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-164">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-170">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-170">dni</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-176">澳大利亚银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-178">包含或不带银行省/市/县分支机构号码的六到十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-178">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-179">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-180">帐号为 6 到 10 位数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-181">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-182">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-183">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-184">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-185">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-186">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-187">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-188">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-189">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-190">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-191">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-192">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-193">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-194">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-210">澳大利亚商务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-210">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-211">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-212">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-213">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-214">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-215">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-216">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-217">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-218">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-219">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-220">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-221">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-222">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-223">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-224">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-225">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-226">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-227">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-228">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-229">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-230">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-231">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-232">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-233">找到来自Keywords_australian_business_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-234">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-235">该函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-245">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-245">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-246">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-246">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-247">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-247">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-248">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-248">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-249">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-249">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-250">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-250">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-251">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-252">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-253">带分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-254">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-255">带分隔符的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-256">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-257">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-257">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-258">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-258">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-259">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-260">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-261">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-262">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-263">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-264">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-265">该函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-266">找到搜索Keyword_Australian_Company_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-267">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-268">该函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-278">澳大利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-279">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-280">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-281">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-282">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-283">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-284">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-285">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-286">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-287">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-288">四到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-289">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-290">九个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-291">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-292">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-293">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-294">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-295">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-296">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-297">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-397">澳大利亚医疗帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-398">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-399">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-400">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-401">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-402">第一个数字的范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-403">第九个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-404">第十个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-405">第 1 (个数字) 可选数字是个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-406">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-407">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-408">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-409">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-410">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-411">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-412">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-413">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-413">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-414">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-414">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-415">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-415">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-416">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-416">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-417">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-417">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-418">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-418">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-419">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-419">information branch</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-424">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-426">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-427">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-428">一个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-429">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-430">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-431">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-432">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-433">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-434">找到来自Keyword_passport或Keyword_australia_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-468">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-470">八到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-471">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-472">8 到 9 个数字通常显示空格，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-473">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-474">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-475">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-476">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-477">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-478">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-479">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-480">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-481">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-482">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-483">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-484">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-487">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-487">australian business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-488">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-488">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-489">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-489">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-490">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-490">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-491">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-491">service veterans</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-492">withholding tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-492">withholding tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-494">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-494">tax file number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-496">奥地利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-497">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-498">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-498">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-499">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-500">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-500">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-501">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-502">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-502">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-503">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-504">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-505">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-505">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-506">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-506">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-633">奥地利身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-633">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-634">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-634">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-635">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-635">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-636">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-636">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-637">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-637">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-638">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-638">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-639">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-639">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-640">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-641">字母、数字和特殊字符的 24 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-641">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-642">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-643">24 个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-643">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="426ce-644">22 个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-644">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-645">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-645">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-646">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-647">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-647">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-648">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-649">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-650">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-650">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-651">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-651">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-652">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-652">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-653">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-653">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-654">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-654">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-655">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-655">national id</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-657">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-657">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-659">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-659">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-660">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-661">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-661">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-662">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-662">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-663">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-663">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-664">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-664">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-665">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-665">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-666">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-666">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-667">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-667">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-668">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-668">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-669">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-669">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-670">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-670">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-671">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-671">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-672">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-673">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-673">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-674">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-674">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-687">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-687">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-688">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-688">reisepassnummer</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-695">奥地利社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-695">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-696">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-696">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-697">10 个数字，采用指定格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-697">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-698">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-698">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-699">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-699">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-700">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-700">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-701">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-701">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-702">对应于 DD.2016 (日期的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-702">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-703">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-704">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-705">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-706">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-706">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-707">该  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-707">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-708">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-708">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-709">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-709">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-710">该  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-710">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-736">奥地利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-736">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-737">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-738">带可选连字符和正斜杠的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-738">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-739">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-740">带可选连字符和正斜杠的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-740">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-741">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-741">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-742">可选连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-742">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-743">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-743">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-744">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-744">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-745">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-745">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-746">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-747">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-747">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-748">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-749">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-749">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-750">该  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-750">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-751">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-751">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-752">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-752">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-753">该  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-753">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-776">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-776">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-777">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-777">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-778">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-778">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-779">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-779">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-780">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-780">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-781">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-781">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-782">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-782">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-783">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-784">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-784">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-785">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-786">11 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-786">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-787">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-787">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-788">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-788">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-789">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-789">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-790">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-790">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-791">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-791">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-792">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-792">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-793">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-793">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-794">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-794">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-795">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-795">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-796">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-796">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-797">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-798">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-798">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-799">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-800">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-801">该Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-801">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-802">找到来自Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-802">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-804">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-804">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-822">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-822">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-823">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-823">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-824">字符串"DocumentDb"后跟下面模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-824">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-825">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-825">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-826">字符串"DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-826">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-827">3-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-827">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-828">大于符号 (>) 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-828">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-829">86 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-829">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-830">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-830">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-831">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-831">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-832">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-832">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-833">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-833">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-834">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-834">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-835">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-835">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-836">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-836">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-851">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-851">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-852">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-853">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-853">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="426ce-854">com"或"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-854">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="426ce-855">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-855">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="426ce-856">net"，字符串"Password"或"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-856">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-857">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-857">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-858">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-858">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-859">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-859">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-860">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-860">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-861">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-861">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-862">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-862">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-863">字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-863">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="426ce-864">com"、"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-864">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="426ce-865">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-865">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="426ce-866">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-866">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-867">1-300 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-867">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-868">字符串"Password"、"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-868">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-869">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-869">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-870">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-870">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-871">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-871">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-872">一个或多个不是分号字符 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇号 () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-872">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-873">a semicolon (;) ， quotation mark (") ， or apostrophe (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-873">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-874">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-875">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-875">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-876">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-877">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-877">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-878">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-878">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-879">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-879">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-906">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-906">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-907">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-907">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-908">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-908">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-909">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-909">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-910">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-910">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-912">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-933">Azure 发布设置密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-933">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-934">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-935">字符串"userpwd="后跟字母数字字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-935">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-936">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-936">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-937">字符串"userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-937">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-938">60 个小写字母或数字的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-938">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-939">引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-939">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-940">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-941">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-942">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-943">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-943">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-944">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-944">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-945">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-945">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-960">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-960">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-961">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-961">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-962">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-962">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="426ce-963">net"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-963">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-964">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-964">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-965">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-965">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="426ce-966">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-966">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-967">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-967">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-968">字符串"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-968">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-969">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-969">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-970">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-970">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-971">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-971">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-972">43 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-972">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-973">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-973">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-974">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-975">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-975">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-976">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-977">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-977">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-978">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-978">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-979">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-979">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
