## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2155">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2155">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2156">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2157">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2157">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2158">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2159">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2159">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2160">六个数字，即地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2160">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2161">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2161">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2162">三个数字，即订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2162">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2163">一个数字，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2163">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2164">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2164">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2165">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2165">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2166">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2166">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2167">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2167">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2168">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2168">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2169">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2169">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2170">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2170">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2171">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2171">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2172">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2172">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2173">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2173">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2176">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2176">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2177">中国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2177">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2178">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2178">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2179">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2179">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2180">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2180">居民 身份证</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2186">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2186">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2187">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2188">14 到 16 个数字，可以格式化或无格式 (dd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2188">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2189">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2190">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2190">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2191">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2192">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2192">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2193">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2194">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2195">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2195">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2196">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2196">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2197">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2197">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2198">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2198">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2199">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2199">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2200">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2201">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2201">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2202">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2202">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2203">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2463">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2463">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2464">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2465">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2465">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2466">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2467">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2467">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2468">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2468">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2469">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2469">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2470">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2470">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2471">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2471">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2472">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2472">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2473">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2473">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2597">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2597">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2598">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2598">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2599">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2600">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2600">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2601">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2602">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2602">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2603">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2603">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2604">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2604">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2605">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2605">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2606">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2606">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2607">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2607">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2608">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2608">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2639">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2639">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2640">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2641">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2641">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2642">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2643">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2643">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2644">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2645">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2645">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2646">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2647">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2647">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2648">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2648">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2649">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2649">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2650">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2650">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2651">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2651">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2652">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2652">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2653">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2671">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2671">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2672">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2672">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2673">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2673">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2674">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2674">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2675">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2675">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2676">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2676">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2677">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2677">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2678">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2678">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2679">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2679">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2680">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2680">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2681">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2681">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2682">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2682">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2683">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2683">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2684">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2684">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2685">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2685">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2686">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2686">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2687">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2687">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2718">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2718">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2719">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2720">12 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2720">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2721">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2722">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2722">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2723">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2724">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2724">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2725">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2726">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2727">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2727">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2728">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2728">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2853">塞浦路斯身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2853">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2854">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2854">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2855">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2855">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2856">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2856">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2857">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2857">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2858">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2858">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2859">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2859">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2860">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2860">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2861">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2861">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2862">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2862">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2863">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2863">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2864">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2865">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2865">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2866">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2867">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2867">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2868">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2868">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2869">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2869">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2870">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2870">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2871">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2871">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2872">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2872">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2873">标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2873">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2874">kim karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2874">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2875">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2875">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2876">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2876">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2877">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2877">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2878">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2878">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2879">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2879">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2880">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2880">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2881">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2881">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2882">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2882">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2883">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2884">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2884">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2885">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2886">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2886">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2887">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2887">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2888">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2888">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2889">正则表达式查找 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2889">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2890">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2890">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2891">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2891">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2892">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2892">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2921">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2921">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2922">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2922">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2923">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2923">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2924">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2924">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2925">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2925">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2926">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2926">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2927">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2927">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2928">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2929">指定模式中八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2929">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2930">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2931">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2931">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2932">a "0" or "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2932">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2933">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2933">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2934">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2934">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2935">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2935">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2936">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2936">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2937">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2937">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2938">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2938">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2939">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2939">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2940">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2940">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2941">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2941">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2942">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2942">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2970">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2970">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2972">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2972">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2973">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2974">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2974">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2975">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2975">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2976">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2976">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2977">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2977">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2978">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2978">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2979">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2980">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2980">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-2981">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-2982">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2983">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2983">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-2984">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-2984">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3110">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3110">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3111">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3112">不带空格或分隔符的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3112">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3113">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3114">不带空格或分隔符的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3114">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3115">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3116">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3116">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3117">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3118">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3118">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3119">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3119">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3120">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3120">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3121">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3121">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3122">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3122">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3123">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3123">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3124">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3146">捷克个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3146">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3147">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3148">九个数字，带可选正斜杠 (旧格式) 十个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3148">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3149">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3150">九个数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3150">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3151">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3151">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3152">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3152">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3153">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3153">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3154">10 个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3154">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3155">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3155">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3156">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3156">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3157">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3157">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3158">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3159">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3159">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3160">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3161">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3161">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3162">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3162">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3163">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3163">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3164">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3164">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3165">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3165">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3166">该函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3166">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3167">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3214">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3214">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3215">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3216">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3216">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3217">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3218">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3218">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3219">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3220">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3220">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3221">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3222">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3223">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3223">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3224">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3224">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3348">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3348">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3349">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3350">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3350">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3351">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3351">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3352">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3352">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3353">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3354">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3354">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3355">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3356">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3356">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3357">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3357">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3358">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3358">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3359">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` DD MM YY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3359">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3360">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3360">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3361">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3361">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3362">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3382">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3382">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3383">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3384">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3384">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3385">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3386">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3386">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3387">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3387">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3388">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3388">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3389">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3389">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3390">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3391">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3391">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3392">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3393">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3394">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3394">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3395">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3395">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3396">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3396">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3397">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3397">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3398">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3398">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3399">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3399">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3471">犯罪管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3471">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3472">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3473">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3473">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3474">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3475">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3475">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3476">一个字母 (可能) 字母集不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3476">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3477">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3477">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3478">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3478">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3479">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3480">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3480">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3481">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3482">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3482">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3483">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3483">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3484">找到一个 `Keyword_dea_number` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3484">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3485">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3485">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3486">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3486">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3487">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3487">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3488">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3488">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3489">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3489">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3490">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3490">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3491">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3491">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3492">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3492">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3493">非法强制执行管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3493">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3494">管制局</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3494">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3495">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3495">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3496">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3497">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3497">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3498">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3499">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3499">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3500">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3500">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3501">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3501">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3502">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3503">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3504">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3505">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3506">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3506">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3507">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3507">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3633">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3633">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3634">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3634">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3635">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3635">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3636">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3636">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3637">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3637">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3638">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3638">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3639">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3639">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3640">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3641">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3641">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3642">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3643">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3643">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3644">一个数字，对应于性生活和百年 (奇数男性，偶数男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3644">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3645">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3645">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3646">三个数字，对应于同一日期出生日期分隔的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3646">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3647">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3647">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3648">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3648">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3649">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3649">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3650">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3650">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3651">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3651">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3652">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3652">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3653">找到一个  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3653">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3654">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3655">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3655">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3688">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3688">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3689">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3690">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3690">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3691">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3692">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3692">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3693">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3694">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3694">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-3695">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3696">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3696">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3697">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3697">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3698">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3698">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3699">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3699">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-3700">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3701">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3701">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-3702">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-3702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
