#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5327">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5327">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5328">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5328">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5329">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5329">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5330">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5330">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5331">希腊社会保险号码 (AMKA) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5331">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5332">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5332">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5333">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5333">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5334">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5334">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5335">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5335">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5336">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5336">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5337">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5337">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5338">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5339">无空格和分隔符的十一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5339">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5340">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5340">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5341">6 个数字作为出生日期 YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5341">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5342">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5342">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5343">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5343">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5344">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5344">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5345">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5345">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5346">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5346">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5347">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5347">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5348">该  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5348">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5349">找到一个  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5349">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5350">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5350">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5351">该  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5351">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5362">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5362">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5363">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5364">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5365">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5365">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5366">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5366">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5367">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5368">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5369">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5370">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5370">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5371">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5372">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5372">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5373">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5373">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5374">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5374">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5375">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5375">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5376">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5376">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5377">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5377">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5378">找到一个  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5378">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5379">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5379">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5380">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5380">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5381">afm#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5381">afm#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5382">afm</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5382">afm</span></span>

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5407">香港身份证号码 (HKID) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5407">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5408">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5409">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5409">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5410">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5411">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5411">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5412">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5412">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5413">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5413">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5414">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5414">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5416">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5418">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5419">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5419">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5420">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5420">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5421">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5421">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5422">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5422">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5423">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5423">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5424">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5424">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5464">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5464">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5465">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5466">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5466">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5467">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5468">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5468">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5469">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5469">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5470">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5470">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5471">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5472">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5473">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5474">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5475">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5475">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5476">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5476">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5601">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5601">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5602">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5602">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5603">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5603">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5604">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5604">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5605">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5605">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5606">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5606">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5607">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5607">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5608">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5608">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5609">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5609">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5610">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5610">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5611">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5611">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5612">1 个数字对应于性别 (1-男性、2- 男性，对于在 1900 之前生活或具有双重公民关系公民的公民，也可以) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5612">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5613">与 YYMMDD (日期对应的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5613">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5614">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5614">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5615">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5615">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5616">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5617">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5617">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5618">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5619">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5619">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5620">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5620">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5621">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5621">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5622">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5622">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5623">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5623">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5624">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5624">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5625">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5625">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5634">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5634">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5635">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5636">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5636">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5637">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5638">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5638">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5639">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5639">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5640">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5640">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5641">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5641">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5642">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5642">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5643">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5643">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5644">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5644">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5645">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YY (示例 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5645">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5646">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5646">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5647">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5647">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5648">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5648">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5665">匈牙利社会保险号码 (TAJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5665">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5666">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5666">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5667">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5667">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5668">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5668">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5669">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5669">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5670">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5671">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5671">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5672">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5673">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5674">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5674">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5675">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5675">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5676">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5676">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5677">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5677">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5697">匈牙利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5697">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5698">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5698">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5699">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5699">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5700">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5700">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5701">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5701">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5702">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5702">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5703">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5703">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5704">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5705">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5705">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5706">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5707">十个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5707">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5708">一个数字，必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5708">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5709">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5709">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5710">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5710">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5711">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5712">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5712">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5713">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5714">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5715">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5715">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5716">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5716">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5717">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5717">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5718">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5718">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5720">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5720">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5729">税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5729">tax identification number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5744">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5744">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5745">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5745">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5746">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5746">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5747">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5747">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5748">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5748">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5749">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5749">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5750">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5750">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5751">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5752">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5752">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5753">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5754">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5754">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5755">2 个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5755">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5756">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5756">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5757">8 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5757">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5758">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5759">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5759">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5760">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5761">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5762">该函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5762">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5763">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5763">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5764">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5765">该函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5765">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5770">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5770">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5771">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5771">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5772">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5772">hungarianvatno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5777">hozzáadottottottték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5777">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5779">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5779">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5781">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5781">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5783">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5783">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5784">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5784">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5785">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5785">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5786">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5786">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5787">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5787">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5788">字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5788">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5789">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5790">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5790">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5791">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5792">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5793">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5793">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5794">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5794">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5795">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5795">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5796">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5796">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5798">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5798">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5801">印度唯一 (Aadhaar) 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5801">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5802">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5803">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5803">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5804">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5804">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5805">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5805">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5806">不为 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5806">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5807">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5807">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5808">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5808">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5809">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5809">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5810">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5810">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5811">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5811">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5812">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5813">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5813">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5814">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5815">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5815">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5816">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5816">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5817">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5817">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5818">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5818">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5819">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5819">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5820">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5820">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5821">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5822">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5822">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5823">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5823">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5824">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5824">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5825">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5825">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5826">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5826">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5827">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5827">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5828">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5828">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5829">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5829">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5830">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5830">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5831">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5832">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5832">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5833">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5834">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5834">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5835">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5835">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5836">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5836">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5837">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5837">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5838">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5838">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5839">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5839">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5840">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5840">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5841">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5841">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5842">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5842">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5843">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5844">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5845">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5846">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5846">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5847">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5847">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5848">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5848">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5849">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5849">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5850">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5850">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5851">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5851">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5852">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5852">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5853">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5853">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5854">IBAN 服务 (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5854">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5855">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5855">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5856">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5856">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5857">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5857">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5858">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5858">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5859">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5859">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5860">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5860">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5861">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5861">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5862">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5862">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-p133">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-p133">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5865">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5865">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5866">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5867">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5868">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5869">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5870">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5870">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5871">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5871">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5872">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5872">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5873">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5873">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5874">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5874">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5875">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5876">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5876">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5877">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5878">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5878">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5879">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5880">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5881">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5882">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5882">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5883">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5883">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5884">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_10_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5884">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5885">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5886">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5886">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5887">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5887">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5888">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5888">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5889">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5889">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5890">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5890">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5891">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5891">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5892">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5892">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5893">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5893">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5894">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5894">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5895">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5895">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5896">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5896">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5897">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5898">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5898">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5899">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5900">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5900">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5901">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5901">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5902">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5902">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5903">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5903">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5904">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5904">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5905">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5905">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5906">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5906">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5907">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5907">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5908">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5908">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5909">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5909">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5910">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5910">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5911">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5911">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5912">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5912">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5913">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5913">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5914">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5914">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5915"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5915">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5916">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5916">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5917">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5918">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5919">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5920">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5920">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5921">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5921">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5922">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5922">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5923">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5923">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5924">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5924">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5925">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5925">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5926">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5926">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5927">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5927">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5928">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5928">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5929">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5929">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5936">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5936">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5937">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5938">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5938">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5939">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5939">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5940">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5940">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5941">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5941">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5942">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5942">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5943">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5943">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5944">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5944">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-5945">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5945">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-5946">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5946">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5947">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5947">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-5948">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-5948">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6072">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6072">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6073">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6074">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6074">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6075">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6076">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6076">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6077">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6077">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6078">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6078">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6079">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6079">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6080">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6080">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6081">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6081">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6082">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6082">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6083">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6083">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6084">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6084">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6085">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYY (示例 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6085">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6086">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6086">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6087">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6087">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6088">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6088">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
