## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6112">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6112">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6114">旧格式 (2012 年 12 月 31 日) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6114">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6115">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6115">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6116">新格式 (2013 年 1 月 1 日及之后) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6116">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6117">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6117">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6118">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6118">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6119">旧格式 (2012 年 12 月 31 日) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6119">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6120">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6120">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6121">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6121">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6122">新格式 (2013 年 1 月 1 日及之后) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6122">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6123">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6123">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6124">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6124">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6125">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6125">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6126">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6127">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6127">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6128">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6129">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6129">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6130">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6130">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6131">找到来自Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6131">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6132">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6132">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6133">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6133">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6134">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6134">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6135">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6135">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6180">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6180">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6181">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6182">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6182">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6183">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6184">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6184">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6185">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6185">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6186">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6186">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6187">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6187">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6188">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6188">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6189">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6189">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6190">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6190">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6191">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6191">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6192">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6193">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6193">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6194">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6195">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6195">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6196">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6196">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6197">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6197">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6198">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6198">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6199">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6199">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6200">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6200">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6201">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6201">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6202">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6202">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6203">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6203">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6204">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6204">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6205">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6206">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6206">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6207">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6207">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6208">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6208">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6209">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6209">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6210">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6210">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6211">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6211">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6212">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6212">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6213">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6213">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6214">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6214">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6215">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6234">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6234">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6235">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6236">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6236">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6237">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6238">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6238">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6239">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6239">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6240">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6240">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6241">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6241">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6242">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6242">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6243">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6244">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6244">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6245">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6246">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6247">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6247">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6248">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6248">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6249">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6249">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6250">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6250">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6251">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6251">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6252">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6252">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6253">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6253">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6254">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6254">patenti di guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6255">patenti guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6255">patenti guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6256">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6256">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6257">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6257">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6258">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6258">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6259">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6259">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6260">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6260">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6261">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6261">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6262">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6262">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6263">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6264">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6264">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6265">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6266">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6266">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6267">三个字母，对应于系列名称中的前三个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6267">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6268">三个字母，分别对应于名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6268">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6269">两个数字，对应于出生日期的最后一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6269">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6270">一个字母，对应于出生日期月份中的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，一月是 A，十月是 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6270">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6271">与出生日期对应的两位数 -为了区分性别，将 40 添加到性别的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6271">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6272">四个数字，对应于某人所 (的国家/地区代码所特有的地区代码，用于) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6272">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6273">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6273">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6274">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6275">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6276">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6277">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6277">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6278">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6278">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6279">找到一个  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6279">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6280">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6280">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6281">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6281">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6316">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6316">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6317">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6317">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6318">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6318">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6319">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6319">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6320">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6320">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6321">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6321">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6322">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6322">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6323">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6324">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6324">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6325">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6326">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6327">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6327">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6328">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6328">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6329">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYY (示例 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6329">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6330">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6330">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6331">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6331">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6332">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6332">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6356">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6356">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6357">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6357">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6358">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6358">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6359">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6359">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6360">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6360">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6361">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6361">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6362">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6362">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6363">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6363">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6364">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6364">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6365">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6365">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6366">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6366">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6367">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6367">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6368">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6368">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6369">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6369">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6370">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6370">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6371">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6372">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6372">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6373">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6374">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6374">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6375">该函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6375">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6376">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6376">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6377">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6377">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6378">该函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6378">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6386">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6386">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6388">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6388">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6390">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6390">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6391">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6391">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6392">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6392">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6393">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6393">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6394">可选 (或短) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6394">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6395">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6395">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6396">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6397">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6397">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6398">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6399">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6400">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6400">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6401">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6401">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6402">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6402">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6403">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6403">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6404">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6404">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6405">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6406">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6406">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6407">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6407">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6454">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6454">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6455">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6456">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6456">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6458">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6458">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6459">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6460">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6460">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6461">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6462">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6462">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6463">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6463">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6464">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6464">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6502">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6502">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6503">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6503">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6504">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6504">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6505">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6505">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6506">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6506">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6507">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6507">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6508">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6508">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6509">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6509">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6510">13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6510">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6511">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6511">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6512">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6512">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6513">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6513">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6514">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6514">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6515">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6516">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6517">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6518">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6519">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6519">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6520">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6520">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6521">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6521">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6522">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6522">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6535">日本我的号码 - 个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6535">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6536">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6536">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6537">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6537">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6538">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6538">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6539">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6539">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6540">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6540">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6541">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6541">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6542">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6543">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6543">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6544">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6545">12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6545">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6546">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6546">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6547">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6547">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6548">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6548">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6549">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6549">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6550">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6550">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6551">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6552">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6553">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6554">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6554">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6555">该Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6555">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6556">找到搜索Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6556">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6557">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6557">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6558">该Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6558">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6571">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6571">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6572">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6572">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6573">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6573">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6574">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6574">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6575">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6575">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6576">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6576">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6577">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6577">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6578">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6578">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6579">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6579">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6580">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6580">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6581">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6581">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6591">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6591">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6592">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6592">パスポート#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6596">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6596">旅券番号♯</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6598">日本居民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6598">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6599">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6600">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6600">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6601">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6602">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6602">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6603">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6603">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6604">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6604">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6605">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6605">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6606">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6606">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6607">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6607">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6608">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6608">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6609">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6609">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6610">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6610">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6611">找到搜索Keyword_jp_residence_card_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6611">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6620">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6620">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6621">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6621">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6622">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6622">11 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6624">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6624">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6625">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6625">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6626">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6626">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6627">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6627">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6628">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6628">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6629">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6629">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6630">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6630">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6635">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6635">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6636">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6636">Resident Register No.</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6643">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6643">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6644">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6645">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6645">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6646">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6647">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6647">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6648">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6648">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6649">可选连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6649">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6650">六位数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6650">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6651">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6651">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6652">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6653">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6653">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6654">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6655">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6655">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6656">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6656">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6657">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6657">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6658">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6658">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6659">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6659">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6660">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6660">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6681">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6681">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6683">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6683">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6684">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6685">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6685">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6686">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6686">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6687">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6687">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6688">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6689">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6689">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6690">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6691">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6692">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6692">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6693">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6693">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6818">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6818">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6820">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6820">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6821">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6822">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6822">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6823">11 个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6823">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6824">对应于 DD.2016 (日期的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6824">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6825">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6825">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6826">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"，"1"表示 20 世纪，"2"对应于 21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6826">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6827">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6827">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6828">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6828">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6829">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6829">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6830">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6830">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6831">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6831">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6832">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6833">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6833">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6834">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6835">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6835">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6836">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6836">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6837">找到一个  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6837">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6838">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6838">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6839">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6839">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6902">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6902">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6903">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6904">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6904">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6905">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6906">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6906">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6907">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6907">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6908">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6908">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6909">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6910">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6910">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6911">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6912">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6912">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6913">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6913">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6914">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6914">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6915">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6915">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6916">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6916">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6917">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6917">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6918">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6918">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6941">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6941">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6942">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6942">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6943">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6943">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6944">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6944">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6945">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6945">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6946">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6947">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6947">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-6948">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-6949">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6949">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6950">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6950">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-6951">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-6951">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7076">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7076">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7077">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7077">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7078">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7078">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7079">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7079">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7080">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7080">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7081">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7081">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7082">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7082">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7083">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7083">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7084">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7084">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7085">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7085">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7086">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7086">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7087">1 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7087">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7088">与 YYMMDD (日期对应的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7088">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7089">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7089">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7090">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7090">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7091">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7091">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7092">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7092">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7093">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7093">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7094">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7094">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7095">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7095">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7096">找到一个  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7096">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7097">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7097">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7098">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7098">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
