## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7133">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7133">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7134">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7135">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7135">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7136">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7136">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7137">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7137">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7138">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7139">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7139">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7140">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7141">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7141">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7142">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7142">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7143">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7143">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7144">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` DD MM YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7144">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7145">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7145">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7146">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7146">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7147">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7147">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7167">都明网驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7167">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7168">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7169">不带空格和分隔符的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7169">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7170">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7171">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7171">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7173">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7173">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7175">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7176">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7176">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7177">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7301"> () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7301">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7302">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7302">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7303">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7303">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7304">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7304">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7305">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7305">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7306">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7306">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7307">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7307">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7308">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7308">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7309">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7309">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7310">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7310">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7311">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7311">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7312">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7312">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7313">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7313">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7314">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7314">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7315">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7315">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7316">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7316">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7317">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7317">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7318">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7318">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7319">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7319">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7320">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7320">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7321">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7321">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7344">比塞明卡护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7344">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7345">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7346">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7346">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7347">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7348">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7348">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7349">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7350">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7350">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7351">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7352">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7352">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7353">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7353">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7354">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7354">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7355">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` DD MM YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7355">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7356">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7356">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7357">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7357">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7358">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7358">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7390"> (非自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7390">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7391">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7391">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7392">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7392">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7393">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7393">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7394">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7394">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7395">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7395">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7396">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7396">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7397">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7397">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7398">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7398">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7399">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7399">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7400">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7400">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7401">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7401">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7402">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7402">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7403">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7404">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7404">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7405">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7406">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7406">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7407">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7407">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7408">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7408">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7409">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7410">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7410">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7450">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7450">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7451">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7452">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7452">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7453">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7454">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7454">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7455">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7455">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7456">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7456">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7457">双字母的出生日期代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7457">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7458">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7458">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7459">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7459">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7460">一位数性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7460">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7461">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7462">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7462">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7463">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7464">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7464">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7465">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7465">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7466">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7466">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7493">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7493">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7494">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7495">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7495">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7496">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7497">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7497">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7498">两个字符 (或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7498">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7499">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7499">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7500">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7500">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7501">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7501">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7502">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7502">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7503">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7504">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7504">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7505">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7506">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7506">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7507">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7507">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7508">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7508">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7632">马耳他身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7632">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7633">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7633">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7634">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7634">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7635">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7635">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7636">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7636">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7637">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7637">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7638">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7638">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7639">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7640">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7640">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7641">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7642">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7642">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7643">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7643">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7644">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7644">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7645">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7646">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7646">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7647">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7648">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7648">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7649">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7649">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7650">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7650">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7651">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7651">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7652">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7652">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7669">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7669">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7670">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7671">不带空格或分隔符的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7671">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7672">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7673">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7673">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7674">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7675">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7675">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7676">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7677">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7677">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7678">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7678">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7679">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7679">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7680">找到一个 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7680">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7681">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7681">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7682">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7682">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7683">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7683">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7703">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7703">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7704">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7705">对于马耳他语的公民：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7705">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7706">指定模式中七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7706">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7707">非马耳他语国家/省和马耳他实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7707">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7708">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7708">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7709">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7710">马耳他语：七位数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7710">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7711">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7711">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7712">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7712">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7713">非马耳他语公民和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7713">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7714">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7714">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7715">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7716">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7716">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7717">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7718">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7718">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7719">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7719">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7720">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7720">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7721">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7721">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7722">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7722">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7755">荷兰公民的服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7755">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7757">包含可选空格的八九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7757">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7759">八九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7759">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7760">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7760">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7761">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7761">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7762">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7762">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7763">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7763">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7764">两位三位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7764">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7765">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7766">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7766">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7767">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7768">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7768">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7769">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7769">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7770">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7770">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7771">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7771">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7795">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7795">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7796">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7797">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7797">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7798">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7799">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7799">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7800">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7801">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7801">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7802">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7804">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7804">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7805">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7805">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7933">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7933">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7934">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7935">无空格或分隔符的九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7935">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7936">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7937">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7937">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7938">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7939">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7939">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7940">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7941">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7941">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7942">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7942">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7943">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7943">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7944">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (示例 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7944">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7945">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7945">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7946">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7946">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7947">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7947">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7965">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7965">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7966">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7966">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7967">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7967">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7968">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7968">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7969">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7969">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7970">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7970">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7971">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7971">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7972">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7972">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7973">不带空格或分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7973">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7974">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7974">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7975">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7975">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7976">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7977">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7977">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-7978">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7979">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7980">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7980">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7981">找到一个  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7981">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-7982">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7982">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-7983">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-7983">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8021">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8021">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8022">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8022">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8023">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8023">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8024">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8024">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8025">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8025">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8026">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8026">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8027">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8027">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8028">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8028">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8029">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8029">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8030">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8030">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8031">14 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8031">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8032">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8032">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8033">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8033">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8034">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8034">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8035">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8035">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8036">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8036">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8037">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8037">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8038">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8038">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8039">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8039">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8040">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8040">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8041">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8041">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8042">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8042">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8043">该函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8043">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8044">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8044">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8045">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8045">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8046">该函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8046">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8048">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8048">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8052">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8052">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8053">btw n与mer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8053">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8055">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8055">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8056">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8056">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8057">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8057">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8058">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8058">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8059">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8059">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8060">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8060">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8061">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8061">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8062">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8063">带可选分隔符的 14 到 16 个数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8063">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8064">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8065">带可选分隔符的 14 到 16 个数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8065">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8066">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8066">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8067">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8067">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8068">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8068">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8069">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8069">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8070">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8070">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8071">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8071">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8072">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8072">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8073">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8073">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8074">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8075">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8076">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8077">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8077">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8078">该函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8078">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8079">找到搜索Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8079">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8080">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8080">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8081">该函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8081">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8089">新西兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8089">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8090">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8090">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8091">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8091">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8092">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8092">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8093">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8093">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8094">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8094">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8095">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8095">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8096">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8096">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8097">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8097">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8098">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8098">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8099">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8099">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8100">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8100">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8101">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8101">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8102">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8103">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8103">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8104">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8105">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8105">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8106">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8106">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8107">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8107">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8108">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8108">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8109">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8109">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8176">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8176">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8177">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8177">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8178">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8178">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8179">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8179">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8180">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8180">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8181">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8181">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8182">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8182">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8184">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8184">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8186">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8186">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8187">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8187">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8188">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8188">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8189">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8189">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8190">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8190">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8191">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8191">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8192">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8193">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8193">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8194">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8195">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8195">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8196">该函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8196">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8197">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8197">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8199">该函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8199">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8208">新西兰卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8208">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8209">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8210">三个字母，一个 (可选) ，四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8210">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8211">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8211">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8212">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8212">three letters (not case sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8213">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8213">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8214">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8214">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8215">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8215">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8216">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8216">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8217">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8217">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8218">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8218">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8219">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8219">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8220">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8220">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8221">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8221">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8222">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8223">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8223">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8224">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8224">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
