## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8238">新西兰社会关系号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8238">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8239">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8239">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8240">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8240">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8241">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8241">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8242">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8242">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8243">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8243">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8244">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8244">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8245">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8246">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8246">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8247">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8248">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8248">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8249">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8249">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8250">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8250">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8251">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8251">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8252">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8252">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8253">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8253">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8254">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8255">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8255">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8256">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8257">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8257">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8258">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8258">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8259">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8259">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8260">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8260">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8261">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8261">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8269">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8269">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8270">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8271">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8271">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8272">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8273">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8273">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8274">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8274">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8275">三位数个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8275">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8276">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8276">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8277">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8277">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8278">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8278">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8279">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8279">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8280">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8280">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8281">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8281">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8282">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8282">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8283">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8283">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8284">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8284">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8285">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8285">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8286">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8286">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8287">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8287">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8288">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8288">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8292">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8292">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8295">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8295">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8296">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8297">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8297">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8298">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8299">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8299">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8300">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8300">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8301">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8301">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8302">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8302">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8303">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8303">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8304">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8304">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8305">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8305">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8306">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8306">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8307">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8307">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8308">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8308">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8309">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8309">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8310">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8310">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8312">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8312">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8316">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8316">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8317">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8317">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8318">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8319">14 个数字，包含 2 个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8319">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8320">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8321">14 个数字和 2 个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8321">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8322">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8322">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8323">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8323">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8324">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8324">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8325">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8325">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8326">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8326">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8327">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8327">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8328">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8328">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8329">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8329">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8330">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8330">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8331">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8331">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8332">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8332">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8456">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8456">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8457">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8457">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8458">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8458">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8459">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8459">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8460">三个字母 (区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8460">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8461">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8462">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8462">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8463">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8464">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8464">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8465">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8465">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8466">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8466">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8467">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8467">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8478">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8478">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8479">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8479">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8480">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8480">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8481">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8481">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8482">6 个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8482">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8483">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8483">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8484">1 个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8484">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8485">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8486">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8486">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8487">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8488">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8488">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8489">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8489">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8490">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8490">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8491">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8491">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8492">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8492">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8493">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8493">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8494">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8494">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8506">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8506">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8507">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8507">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8508">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8509">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8509">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8510">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8511">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8511">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8512">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8513">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8513">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8514">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8515">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8515">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8516">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8516">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8517">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8517">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8518">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8518">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8519">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8519">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8520">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8520">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8525">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8525">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8526">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8526">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8527">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8527">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8528">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8528">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8529">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8529">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8530">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8530">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8531">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8531">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8532">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8532">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8533">九位数或 14 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8533">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8534">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8534">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8535">九位数字或 14 位号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8535">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8536">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8536">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8537">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8537">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8538">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8538">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8539">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8539">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8540">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8541">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8541">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8542">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8543">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8543">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8544">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8544">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8545">找到搜索Keywords_polish_regon_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8545">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8546">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8546">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8547">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8547">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8548">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8548">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8549">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8549">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8550">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8550">regon id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8551">统计数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8551">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8552">统计 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8552">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8553">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8553">statistical no</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8564">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8564">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8565">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8565">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8566">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8566">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8567">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8567">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8568">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8568">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8569">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8569">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8570">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8570">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8571">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8571">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8572">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8572">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8573">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8574">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8574">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8575">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8575">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8576">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8576">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8577">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8577">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8578">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8578">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8579">该  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8579">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8580">找到一个  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8580">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8610">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8610">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8611">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8612">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8612">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8613">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8614">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8614">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8615">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8616">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8616">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8617">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8618">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8618">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8619">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8619">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8620">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8620">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8640">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8640">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8641">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8642">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8642">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8643">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8643">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8644">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8644">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8645">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8645">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8646">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8646">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8647">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8647">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8648">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8648">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8649">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8649">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8650">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字，带特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8650">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8651">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8651">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8652">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8652">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8653">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8653">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8654">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8654">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8655">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8655">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8656">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8657">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8658">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8659">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8660">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8660">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8661">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8670">driver lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8670">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8671">驱动程序 lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8671">driver lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8672">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8672">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8673">driver licenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8673">driver licenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8674">driver licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8674">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8793">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8793">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8794">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8795">一个字母后跟六个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8795">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8796">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8797">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8797">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8798">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8798">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8799">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8799">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8800">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8801">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8801">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8802">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8803">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8804">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8804">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8805">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8805">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8806">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8806">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8807">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8807">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8808">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8808">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8809">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8809">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8836">葡萄牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8836">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8838">九个数字（带可选空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8838">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8839">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8839">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8840">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8840">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8841">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8841">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8842">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8842">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8843">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8843">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8844">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8844">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8845">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8846">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8846">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8847">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8848">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8848">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8849">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8849">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8850">找到一个  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8850">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8851">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8851">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8852">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8852">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8877">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8877">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8878">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8879">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8879">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8880">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8881">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8881">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8882">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8882">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8883">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8883">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8884">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8885">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-8886">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-8887">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8887">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8888">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8888">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-8889">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-8889">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9017">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9017">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9018">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9018">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9019">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9019">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9020">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9020">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9021">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9021">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9022">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9022">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9023">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9023">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9024">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9025">13 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9025">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9026">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9026">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9027">1 位到 9 位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9027">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9028">表示 YYMMDD (出生日期的 6 个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9028">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9029">2 个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9029">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9030">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9030">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9031">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9032">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9032">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9033">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9034">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9034">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9035">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9035">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9036">找到一个  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9036">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9037">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9037">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9038">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9038">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9089">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9089">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9090">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9091">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9091">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9092">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9093">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9093">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9094">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9095">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9095">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9096">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9097">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9097">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9098">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9098">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9099">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9099">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9100">正则表达式查找 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (示例- 01 二月/二月 10) 或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字的日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9100">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9101">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9101">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9102">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9102">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9103">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9103">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9121">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9121">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9122">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9122">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9123">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9123">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9124">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9124">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9125">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9125">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9126">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9126">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9127">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9127">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9128">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9129">十位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9129">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9130">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9130">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9131">十位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9131">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9132">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9132">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9133">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9133">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9134">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9134">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9135">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9135">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9136">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9136">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9137">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9138">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9139">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9140">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9140">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9141">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9141">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9142">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9142">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9159">俄罗斯护照号码国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9159">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9160">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9160">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9161">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9161">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9162">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9162">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9163">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9163">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9164">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9164">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9165">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9165">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9166">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9167">九位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9167">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9168">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9169">九位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9169">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9170">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9170">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9171">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9171">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9172">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9172">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9173">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9173">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9174">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9174">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9175">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9176">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9176">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9177">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9177">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9178">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9178">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9195">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9195">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9196">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9197">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9197">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9198">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9199">十个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9199">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9200">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9201">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9201">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9202">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9203">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9203">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9204">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9204">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9205">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9205">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9212">新加坡国家/ (身份证号码) NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9212">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9213">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9214">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9214">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9215">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9215">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9216">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9216">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9217">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9217">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9218">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9218">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9219">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9219">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9220">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9221">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9221">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9222">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9223">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9223">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9224">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9224">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9225">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9225">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9226">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9226">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9227">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9228">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9228">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9229">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9229">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9240">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9240">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9241">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9242">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9242">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9243">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9244">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9244">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9245">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9245">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9246">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9246">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9247">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9248">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9249">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9250">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9251">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9251">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9252">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9378">斯洛伐克个人编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9378">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9379">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9379">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9380">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9380">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9381">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9381">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9382">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9382">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9383">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9383">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9384">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9384">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9385">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9385">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9386">包含可选反反杠的九个或十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9386">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9387">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9387">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9388">6 个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9388">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9389">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9389">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9390">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9390">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9391">1 个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9391">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9392">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9393">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9393">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9394">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9395">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9395">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9396">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9396">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9397">找到一个  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9397">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9398">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9398">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9399">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9399">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
