## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9446">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9446">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9447">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9448">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9448">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9449">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9450">一个数字或字母 (区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9450">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9451">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9452">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9453">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9454">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9454">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9455">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9455">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9456">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9456">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9457">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9457">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9458">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9458">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9459">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9459">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9460">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9460">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9482">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9482">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9484">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9484">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9485">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9486">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9486">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9487">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9487">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9488">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9488">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9489">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9489">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9490">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9491">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9491">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9492">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9492">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9619">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9619">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9620">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9620">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9621">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9621">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9622">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9622">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9623">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9623">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9624">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9624">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9625">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9625">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9626">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9627">13 个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9627">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9628">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9629">指定模式中的 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9629">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9630">与 DDMMLLL (日期对应的七个数字) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9630">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9631">对应于出生日期"50"的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9631">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9632">三个数字，对应于同一天（男性为 (000-499）和 500-999（对于男性）的性别和序列号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9632">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9633">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9633">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9634">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9634">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9635">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9635">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9636">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9636">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9637">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9637">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9638">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9638">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9639">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9639">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9640">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9640">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9641">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9641">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9669">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9669">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9670">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9671">两个字母后跟七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9671">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9672">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9673">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9673">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9674">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9674">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9675">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9675">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9676">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9676">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9677">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9677">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9678">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9678">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9679">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9679">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9680">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9680">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9681">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9681">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9682">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9682">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9683">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9683">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9684">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9684">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9685">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9685">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9686">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9686">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9709">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9709">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9710">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9710">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9711">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9711">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9712">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9712">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9713">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9713">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9714">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9714">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9715">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9715">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9716">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9717">八个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9717">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9718">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9718">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9719">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9719">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9720">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9720">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9721">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9721">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9722">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9723">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9723">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9724">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9725">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9725">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9726">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9726">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9727">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9727">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9728">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9728">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9729">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9729">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9753">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9753">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9754">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9755">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9755">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9756">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9757">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9757">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9758">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9758">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9759">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9759">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9760">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9760">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9761">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9761">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9762">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9762">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9763">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9764">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9765">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9766">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9767">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9767">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9768">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9768">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9769">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9775">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9775">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9776">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9777">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9777">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9778">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9779">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9779">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9780">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9780">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9781">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9781">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9782">由世纪和性别确定的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9782">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9783">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9783">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9784">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9784">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9785">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9785">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9786">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9787">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9787">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9788">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9788">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9789">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9789">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9790">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9790">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9791">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9791">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9792">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9793">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9794">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9794">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9795">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9796">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9796">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9797">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9797">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9798">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9798">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9799">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9799">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9800">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9800">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9801">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9801">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9802">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9802">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9803">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9803">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9804">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9805">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9805">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9806">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9807">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9807">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9808">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9808">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9809">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9809">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9811">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9811">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9813">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9814">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9814">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9815">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9815">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9816">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9816">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9817">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9817">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9951">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9951">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9952">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9952">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9953">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9953">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9954">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9954">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9955">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9955">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9956">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9956">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9957">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9957">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9958">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9959">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9959">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9960">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9961">七个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9961">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9962">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9962">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9963">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9963">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9964">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9964">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9965">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9966">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9966">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9967">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9968">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9968">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9969">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9969">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9970">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9970">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9971">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9971">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-9972">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9972">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9996">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9996">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9997">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9997">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-9998">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9998">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-9999">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-9999">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10000">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10000">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10001">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10001">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10002">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10002">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10003">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10003">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10004">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10005">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10005">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10006">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10007">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10008">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10008">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10009">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10009">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10010">正则表达式查找 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10010">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10011">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10012">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10012">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10013">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10013">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10042">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10042">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10043">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10044">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10044">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10045">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10046">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10046">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10047">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10047">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10048">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10048">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10049">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10049">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10050">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10050">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10051">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10051">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10052">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10053">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10053">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10054">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10055">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10055">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10056">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10056">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10057">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10057">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10058">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10058">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10059">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10059">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10060">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10060">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10061">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10061">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10062">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10062">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10063">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10063">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10064">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10064">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10065">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10065">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10066">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10066">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10067">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10067">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10068">指定模式中七个或八个数字以及一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10068">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10069">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10069">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10070">拥有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10070">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10071">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10071">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10072">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10072">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10073">没有西班牙国家身份证的非居民西班牙人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10073">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10074">一个小写字母"L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10074">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10075">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10075">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10076">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10076">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10077">没有西班牙国家身份证的 14 岁以下的儿童居民：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10077">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10078">一个小写字母"K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10078">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10079">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10079">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10080">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10080">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10081">具有一个百万美元标识号的百万美元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10081">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10082">一个区分大小写的大写字母"X"、"Y"或"Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10082">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10083">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10083">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10084">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10084">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10085">没有一个百万的标识号的亿元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10085">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10086">一个区分大小写的大写字母 ("M") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10086">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10087">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10087">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10088">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10088">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10089">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10089">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10090">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10090">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10091">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10091">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10092">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10092">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10093">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10093">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10094">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10094">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10095">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10095">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10096">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10096">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10127">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10127">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10128">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10129">字符串"User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"或"UserId"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10129">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10130">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10130">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10131">字符串"User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10131">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10132">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10132">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10133">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"的前面没有小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10133">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10134">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10134">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10135">不是美元符号 ($) 、百分比符号 (%) 、大于符号 (>) 、符号为 (@) 、引号 (") 、分号 (;) 、左大括号 ([) 或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10135">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10136">7-128 个字符（不是分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10136">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10137">一个分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10137">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10138">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10139">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10139">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10140">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10141">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10141">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10142">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10142">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10143">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter **关键字** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10143">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10144">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10144">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10145">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10145">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10146">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10146">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10150">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10150">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10151">示例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10151">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10152">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10152">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10153"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10153">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10154">密码或 pwd 后跟 0-2 个空格、等号 (=) 、0-2 个空格和星号 (\*) --OR--</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10154">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10155">密码或 pwd 后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10155">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10156">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10156">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10157">小于符号 (<) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10157">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10158">大写或小写字母、数字、星号 (\*) 、连字符 (-) 、下划线 (_) 或空格字符的 1-200 个字符的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10158">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10159">大于符号 (>) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10159">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10161"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10161">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10173">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10173">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10174">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10175">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10175">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10176">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10177">包含连字符的十个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10177">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10178">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10178">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10179">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10179">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10180">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10180">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10181">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10182">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10183">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10184">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10185">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10185">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10186">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10319">瑞典国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10319">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10320">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10320">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10321">10 位或 12 位和可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10321">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10322">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10322">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10323">10 位或 12 位以及可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10323">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10324">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10324">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10325">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10325">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10326">"-"或"+"分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10326">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10327">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10328">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10329">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10329">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10330">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10331">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10331">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10332">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10332">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10333">找到一个 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10333">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10334">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10334">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10335">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10336">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10336">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10337">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10337">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10356">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10356">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10357">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10357">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10358">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10359">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10359">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10360">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10361">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10361">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10362">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10363">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10363">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10364">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10365">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10366">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10366">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10367">下列情况之一为 true：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10367">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10368">找到搜索Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10368">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10369">找到Keyword_sweden_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10369">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10400">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10400">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10401">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10401">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10402">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10402">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10403">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10403">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10404">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10404">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10405">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10405">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10406">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10406">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10407">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10408">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10408">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10409">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10410">10 个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10410">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10411">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10411">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10412">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10412">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10413">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10413">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10414">对于 1990 之前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或外种人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10414">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10415">第九个位置的数字表示性别（对于男性或甚至对于男性）为奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10415">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10416">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10416">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10417">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10418">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10418">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10419">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10420">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10420">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10421">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10421">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10422">找到一个  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10422">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10423">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10423">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10424">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10424">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10450">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10450">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10451">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10452">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10452">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10453">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10454">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10454">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10455">四个字母银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10455">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10456">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10456">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10457">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10457">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10458">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10458">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10459">BBAN 代码的剩余部分 (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10459">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10460">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10461">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10461">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10462">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10463">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10464">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10464">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10465">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10465">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
