## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10502">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10502">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10503">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10503">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10504">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10504">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10505">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10505">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10506">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10506">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10507">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10507">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10508">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10508">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10509">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10509">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10510">13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10510">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10511">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10511">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10512">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10512">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10513">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10513">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10514">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10514">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10515">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10515">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10516">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10516">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10517">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10517">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10518">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10518">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10519">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10519">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10520">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10521">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10521">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10522">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10523">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10523">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10524">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10524">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10525">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10525">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10526">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10526">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10527">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10527">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10548">台湾地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10548">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10549">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10550">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10550">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10551">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10552">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10552">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10553">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10553">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10554">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10554">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10555">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10555">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10556">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10557">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10557">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10558">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10559">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10559">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10560">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10560">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10561">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10561">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10562">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10563">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10563">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10564">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10564">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10565">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10565">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10570">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10570">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10571">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10571">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10574">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10574">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10575">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10575">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10576">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10576">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10577">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10577">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10578">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10578">簽名</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10581">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10581">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10582">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10582">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10583">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10583">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10584">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10584">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10585">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10585">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10586">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10586">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10587">生物识别护照号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10587">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10588">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10588">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10589">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10589">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10590">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10590">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10591">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10591">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10592">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10593">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10593">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10594">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10595">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10595">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10596">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10596">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10597">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10597">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10608">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10608">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10609">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10610">十个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10610">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10611">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10612">十个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10612">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10613">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10613">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10614">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10614">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10615">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10616">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10616">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10617">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10618">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10618">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10619">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10619">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10620">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10620">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10626">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10626">Identification card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10628">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10628">ARC</span></span>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10634">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10634">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10635">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10636">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10636">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10637">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10638">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10638">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10639">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10639">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10640">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10640">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10641">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10642">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10643">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10644">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10644">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10645">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10645">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10646">找到搜索Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10646">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10647">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10647">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10648">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10648">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10655">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10655">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10656">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10656">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10657">土耳其国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10657">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10659">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10659">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10660">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10661">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10661">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10662">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10663">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10663">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10664">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10665">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10665">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10666">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10666">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10667">找到搜索Keyword_Turkish_National_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10667">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10668">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10668">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10669">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10669">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10671">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10671">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10676">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10676">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10677">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10677">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10678">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10678">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10679">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10680">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10680">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10681">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10682">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10682">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10683">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10683">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10684">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10684">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10685">如果驱动程序是男性（即 51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12 位），则日期格式 MMDDY 中用于出生日期的五个数字 (第 7 个字符将递增 50) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10685">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10686">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10686">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10687">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10687">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10688">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10689">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10689">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10690">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10691">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10692">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10692">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10693">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10693">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10694">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10694">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10695">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10695">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10696">Keyword_uk_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10696">Keyword_uk_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10697">DVLA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10697">DVLA</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10698">light vans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10698">light vans</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10699">quadbikes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10699">quadbikes</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10700">motor cars</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10700">motor cars</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10701">125cc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10701">125cc</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10702">sidecar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10702">sidecar</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10703">三周</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10703">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10704">一些</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10704">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10705">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10705">photocard licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10706">learner drivers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10706">learner drivers</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10712">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10712">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10713">roll roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10713">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10714">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10715">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10715">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10716">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10716">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10717">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10717">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10718">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10718">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10719">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10719">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10720">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10720">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10721">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10721">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10722">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10722">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10723">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10723">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10725">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10725">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10730">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10730">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10731">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10731">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10733">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10733">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10734">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10735">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10735">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10736">三个或十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10736">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10737">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10737">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10738">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10738">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10739">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10739">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10740">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10740">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10741">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10742">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10742">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10743">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10744">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10744">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10745">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10745">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10746">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10746">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10747">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10747">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10748">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10748">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10749">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10749">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10750">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10750">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10765">D.O.B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10765">D.O.B</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10768">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10768">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10769">NINO 国家/ (号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10769">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10770">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/区标识号敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10770">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10771">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10772">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10772">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10773">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10773">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10774">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10774">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10775">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10775">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10776">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10776">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10777">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D" (类似前缀，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10777">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10778">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10778">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10779">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10779">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10780">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10780">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10781">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10781">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10782">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10782">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10783">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10784">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10784">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10785">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10785">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10786">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10786">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10787">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10787">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10788">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10789">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10789">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10790">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10791">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10791">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10792">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10792">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10793">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10793">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10794">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10795">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10795">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10806">medical attention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10806">medical attention</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10807">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10807">social security</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10808">great britain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10808">great britain</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10817">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10817">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10818">唯一的税务参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10818">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10819">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10820">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10821">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10822">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10823">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10824">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10826">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10826">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10827">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10828">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10828">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10829">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10830">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10830">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10831">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10832">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10832">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10833">该  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10833">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10834">找到一个  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10834">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10854">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10854">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10855">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10855">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10856">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10856">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10857">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10857">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10858">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10858">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10859">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10859">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10860">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10860">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10861">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10861">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10862">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10862">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10863">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10863">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10864">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10864">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10894">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10894">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10895">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10896">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10896">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10897">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10898">取决于州 - 例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10898">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10899">9 个数字，格式设置为 ddd ddd ddd 将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10899">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10900">九位数字（如 ddddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10900">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10901">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10901">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10902">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10902">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-10903">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10903">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10904">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10904">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10905">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10905">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10906">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10906">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10907">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10907">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-10908">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10908">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10909">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10909">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10910">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10910">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10911">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10911">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-10912">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-10912">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11010">ITIN 中美国个人纳税 (标识) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11010">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11011">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11012">九个数字，以"9"开头，包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字，可选格式为空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11012">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11013">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11014">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11014">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11015">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11015">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11016">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11016">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11017">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11017">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11018">a "7" or "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11018">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11019">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11019">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11020">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11020">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11021">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11021">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11022">unformatted：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11022">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11023">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11023">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11024">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11024">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11025">a "7" or "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11025">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11026">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11026">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11027">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11028">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11028">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11029">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11030">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11030">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11031">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11031">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11032">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11032">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11033">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11033">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11034">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11034">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11035">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11035">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11036">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11036">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11037">该函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11037">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11038">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11038">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11039">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11039">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11040">报税人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11040">taxpayer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11042">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11042">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11043">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11043">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11044">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11044">i.t.i.n.</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11052">SSN (美国社会保险号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11052">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11054">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11054">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11055">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11055">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11056">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11057">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11057">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11058">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11058">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11059">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11059">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11060">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11060">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11061">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11061">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11062">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11063">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11063">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11064">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11065">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11065">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11066">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11066">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11067">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11067">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11068">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11068">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11069">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11069">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11070">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11070">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11071">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11071">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11072">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11072">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11073">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11073">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11074">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11074">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11075">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11075">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11076">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11076">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="426ce-11139">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="426ce-11140">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11140">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="426ce-11169">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="426ce-11169">Keywords</span></span>
